page.title: 05THE FORGE IN SUDBURY
page.content: The{forge}started in 1968 and was owned by Mr. Hitchmough. It was called Metwood Forge and they made things in{wrought iron.}Then in 1978 a company was formed to manufacture excavator buckets. Now it is owned by Mr Walker who has worked there since 1974. He has got eleven people working there. One of them is his wife, Mrs. Walker. She works in the office with Mrs. Harris, while Mr. Walker works in the shop. One of the workers, Mr. Baldy comes on Tuesday and Thursday to tidy up the mess that has been made. The buildings used to be a farm until they were taken over.
